en.title: Max Power and Energy.
en.content:
Seeing is Believing

 
See the POWER! 4 individuals with the Quantum Pendant can EASILY lift another individual into the air, with their forefingers. Without the Quantum Pendant, it is very difficult.
 
See the STRENGTH! An elderly lady wearing the Quantum Pendant stood strong and sturdy when pulled from the back. Without the Quantum Pendant, she was unstable and stumbled.
 
Enormous Increases In Maximum Power And Energy 
 
Get ready to experience the Impossible! Enormous increase in maximum power, within seconds of wearing FusionExcel’s amazing Quantum Pendant, plus dramatically enhance your energy, mental focus and endurance levels.

The Quantum Pendant is a powerful performance enhancement innovation. The extreme and instantaneous effect on endurance, strength and mental focus is SIMPLY AMAZING!

The Quantum Pendant utilizes specialized quantum physics, geometry and vibration harnessing technologies to help synergize the power of the human body's bio-energy system and allows it to run with optimum performance. Known as chi, or life force energy in some cultures, it runs through meridian points in our body. The Quantum Pendant’s technology actually helps to repel interference frequencies that block the free flow of this energy throughout the body. Similar to upping the watts in a light bulb...the Quantum Pendant helps to instantly and dramatically increase the connectivity, flow and communication of your energy system! By simply wearing the Quantum Pendant, you will experience a charge of mental focus, strength and endurance of mind-blowing proportions! You simply can't believe how powerful it is!
